questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a Statement of Work (SOW) in a project?

answers.a: To define the project scope and objectives
answers.b: To outline the project schedule and timelines
answers.c: To determine the project budget and resources
answers.d: To identify the project risks and mitigation strategies

questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of a well-structured Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)?

answers.a: It is a linear, sequential list of tasks
answers.b: It is a hierarchical decomposition of the project into smaller tasks
answers.c: It is a detailed, step-by-step guide for project execution
answers.d: It is a high-level overview of the project scope and objectives

answers.a: It helps to identify project risks and mitigation strategies
